languages.text: "Вольный Торговец пренебрег{mf||ла} своими прямыми обязанностями судьи и отказал{mf|ся|ась} вынести приговор по делу леди Моллес-Секандас. В результате семейная междоусобица вылилась в кровавую расправу, обезглавившую два дворянских рода, а главное — оставившую важные для Империума производства без компетентных управляющих".

"The Rogue Trader neglected {mf|his|her} direct duties in refusing to pass a verdict in the Lady Molles-Secundas case. As a result, what had begun as a family feud escalated into a massacre that not only decapitated two noble houses but, worst of all, left manufacturing facilities of great importance to the Imperium without competent managers."
languages.original_text: "Вольный Торговец пренебрег{mf||ла} своими прямыми обязанностями судьи и отказал{mf|ся|ась} вынести приговор по делу леди Моллес-Секандас. В результате семейная междоусобица вылилась в кровавую расправу, обезглавившую два дворянских рода, а главное — оставившую важные для Империума производства без компетентных управляющих".

As a result, what had begun as a family feud escalated to a massacre that not only decapitated two noble houses but, worst of all, left manufacturing facilities of importance to the Imperium without competent managers."

As a result, what had begun as a family feud escalated into a massacre that not only decapitated two noble houses but, worst of all, left manufacturing facilities of great importance to the Imperium without competent managers."

languages.text: “行商浪人未能履行{mf|他|她}的直接职责，拒绝对莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人一案作出裁决。在此之后，这场家族之间的恩怨很快升级成了全面战争，两个贵族家族也因此毁于一旦。更糟糕的是，对帝国至关重要的制造工厂，也因为这场争端而失去了称职的管理者。”
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader neglected {mf|his|her} direct duties in refusing to pass a verdict in the Lady Molles-Secundas case. As a result, what had begun as a family feud escalated into a massacre that not only decapitated two noble houses but, worst of all, left manufacturing facilities of great importance to the Imperium without competent managers."

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人未能履行{mf|他|她}的直接职责，拒绝对莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人一案作出裁决。在此之后，这场家族之间的恩怨很快升级成了全面战争，两个贵族家族也因此毁于一旦。更糟糕的是，对帝国至关重要的制造工厂，也因为这场争端而失去了称职的管理者。”

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダーはレディ・モレス・セクンダス事件で判決を下すことを拒み、直接の職務を怠りました。その結果、家族間の争いとして始まったものが虐殺へと発展しました。二つの家の貴族が断絶したばかりか、帝国にとって重要な製造施設に有能な管理者がいなくなる事態に陥りました」
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader neglected {mf|his|her} direct duties in refusing to pass a verdict in the Lady Molles-Secundas case. As a result, what had begun as a family feud escalated into a massacre that not only decapitated two noble houses but, worst of all, left manufacturing facilities of great importance to the Imperium without competent managers."

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダーはレディ・モレス・セクンダス事件で判決を下すことを拒み、直接の職務を怠りました。その結果、家族間の争いとして始まったものが虐殺へと発展しました。二つの家の貴族が断絶したばかりか、帝国にとって重要な製造施設に有能な管理者がいなくなる事態に陥りました」

languages.text: "{mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} vernachlässigte {mf|seine|ihre} direkten Pflichten durch die Verweigerung eines Urteils im Fall Lady Molles-Secundas. Als Resultat eskalierte der Familienzwist zu einem Massaker, das nicht nur zwei Adelshäuser ihres Oberhaupts beraubte, sondern – viel schlimmer – für das Imperium überaus wichtige Produktionsstätten ohne kompetente Führung zurückließ."
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader neglected {mf|his|her} direct duties in refusing to pass a verdict in the Lady Molles-Secundas case. As a result, what had begun as a family feud escalated into a massacre that not only decapitated two noble houses but, worst of all, left manufacturing facilities of great importance to the Imperium without competent managers."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} vernachlässigte {mf|seine|ihre} direkten Pflichten durch die Verweigerung eines Urteils im Fall Lady Molles-Secundas. Als Resultat eskalierte der Familienzwist zu einem Massaker, das nicht nur zwei Adelshäuser ihres Oberhaupts beraubte, sondern – viel schlimmer – für das Imperium überaus wichtige Produktionsstätten ohne kompetente Führung zurückließ."

languages.text: "Leydi Molles-Secundas meselesine hüküm getirmeyi reddeden Hür Tacir, vazifesini ihmal etti. Aile kavgası olarak başlayan hadise, iki soylu haneyi başsız bırakan bir katliama dönüştü. Dahası İmparatorluk için elzem imalat tesisleri ehil idarecilerden yoksun kaldı."
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader neglected {mf|his|her} direct duties in refusing to pass a verdict in the Lady Molles-Secundas case. As a result, what had begun as a family feud escalated into a massacre that not only decapitated two noble houses but, worst of all, left manufacturing facilities of great importance to the Imperium without competent managers."

traits.locale_text: "Leydi Molles-Secundas meselesine hüküm getirmeyi reddeden Hür Tacir, vazifesini ihmal etti. Aile kavgası olarak başlayan hadise, iki soylu haneyi başsız bırakan bir katliama dönüştü. Dahası İmparatorluk için elzem imalat tesisleri ehil idarecilerden yoksun kaldı."

languages.text: «{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ha demostrado negligencia al negarse a dictar sentencia en el caso de lady Molles-Secundas. Como resultado, lo que empezó como un conflicto familiar se convirtió en una masacre que no solo ha decapitado a dos casas nobles, sino que, lo que es peor, ha dejado instalaciones de manufactura de gran importancia para el Imperium sin gestión competente».
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader neglected {mf|his|her} direct duties in refusing to pass a verdict in the Lady Molles-Secundas case. As a result, what had begun as a family feud escalated into a massacre that not only decapitated two noble houses but, worst of all, left manufacturing facilities of great importance to the Imperium without competent managers."

traits.locale_text: «{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ha demostrado negligencia al negarse a dictar sentencia en el caso de lady Molles-Secundas. Como resultado, lo que empezó como un conflicto familiar se convirtió en una masacre que no solo ha decapitado a dos casas nobles, sino que, lo que es peor, ha dejado instalaciones de manufactura de gran importancia para el Imperium sin gestión competente».

languages.text: « {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a négligé son devoir direct en refusant de juger l'affaire de dame Molles-Secundas. En conséquence, ce qui n'était à l'origine qu'une simple querelle familiale s'est soldé par un massacre qui a décapité deux maisons nobles. Pire encore, des fabriques d'une importance capitale pour l'Imperium se retrouvent maintenant privées de responsables compétents. »
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader neglected {mf|his|her} direct duties in refusing to pass a verdict in the Lady Molles-Secundas case. As a result, what had begun as a family feud escalated into a massacre that not only decapitated two noble houses but, worst of all, left manufacturing facilities of great importance to the Imperium without competent managers."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a négligé son devoir direct en refusant de juger l'affaire de dame Molles-Secundas. En conséquence, ce qui n'était à l'origine qu'une simple querelle familiale s'est soldé par un massacre qui a décapité deux maisons nobles. Pire encore, des fabriques d'une importance capitale pour l'Imperium se retrouvent maintenant privées de responsables compétents. »
